Source.Name: pardus-desktop-services
Source.Description: pardus-desktop-services is a wrapper python module for integrating various desktop environments using PyQt.

Update.Comment: - New version 1.2.6 - Added new widget for paging inside QWidgets called QPageWidget - Added environment support for LXDE, Fluxbox, Gnome and Gnome3 - Additional SessionType variable added to check KDE 4
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: - New version 1.2.5 - Fixed QuniqueApplication translations - Bug fixed at http://bugs.pardus.org.tr/16767
Update.Name: Gökmen Göksel

Update.Comment: - New version 1.2.4 - Oversize overlay icon issues are fixed - Add option to update available icons list QIconLoader - Make overlay opacity optional - Add global forceCache option to QIconLoader - A new method added to Pds.gui setOverlayClickMethod - Support multiple config paths - Support to define position of overlay icon in QIconLoader - QNetworkManager, a new widget to show/change_states of network profiles from NetworkManager backend. - Test scripts seperated, under tests directory - Shadow support added for Pds.Gui - Fixed garbage collection
